tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
As a dentist myself, I hold high standards when it comes to dental care, and I can confidently say that Dr. Aarti Talkoti at Infinit Dental Solutions exceeded all expectations. I recently underwent implant prosthesis treatment at their clinic, and from start to finish, the experience was nothing short of exceptional.

Dr. Talkoti's expertise and attention to detail were evident throughout the process. She took the time to thoroughly explain the procedure, addressing my concerns and ensuring I felt comfortable every step of the way. Her professionalism, coupled with a warm and welcoming demeanour, immediately put me at ease.

Moreover, I was truly impressed by the state-of-the-art dental armamentarium available at Infinit Dental Solutions. The advanced technology and equipment utilized in my treatment contributed to the precision and accuracy of the results.

The final and permanent prosthesis that Dr. Talkoti crafted for me not only restored esthetics but also enhanced my overall oral health and functionality. I am beyond satisfied with the outcome and grateful for the skill and care provided by Dr. Talkoti.

I highly recommend Infinit Dental Solutions to anyone seeking top-notch dental care. Thank you, Dr. Aarti Talkoti, for your outstanding work and commitment to excel.

Sincerely,
Dr. Akash JS Shegaonkar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I'm very happy that i took treatment from Dr. Aarti Talikoti....she has immense patience....listened to my problems and explained me what needs to be done in a logical way.  She is very co operative about my responses during the course of treatment.  The medicines given are customised....in toto she is very good doctor and highly knowledgeable person.  I'm grateful for her.  Thankyou Doctor.
reply_text: Thank you ma‚Äôam .. It‚Äôs been great experience serving you..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Arati is friendly and explains everything. Even at the time of working on the teeth she tells what procedure she is doing, what she has completed. She is totally transparent including billing. She explained what treatment is required for my teeth condition and how much it costs affront. For implants she gave the batch number etc given by the manufacturer. For ceramic crowns she has given the card giving warranty for 10 years. Quality of material used and hygiene in the clinic is top class. She  immediately gives time and attends to some minor problems faced. I am extremely satisfied and happy to recommend her to my friends and relatives.
reply_text: Thank you very much sir for sharing your experience. It motivates us and helps you better in future üòä

tags: None
review:
Infinit Dental Solution is a 1-stop dental clinic for me. I first visited in 2010 and since then it has been the ONLY reliable dental solution to me. I have been referring it to many of my friends and family members. Dr. Shambhu and Dr. Aarti are super friendly and caring Dentists. They take care of a patient very well, listen to the concerns calmly, explain the procedure very well and most importantly their fixes lasts long, very long. Lately I visited for my 6yr old child and we came out smiling like nothing happened. 
I would keep on recommending this clinic to everyone possible.
reply_text: Thank you for words of satisfaction sir. Treating Shanaya was great experience. We are glad and thankful for recommending our clinic to your friendsüòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Talikoti has been very courtesy during the visits and has lot of patience to explain the problem and fix it.
Infinit dental solution is one stop for all tooth problems. I started with my wife treatment and she was very comfortable with Dr. Talikoti for support and professional touch to fix the problem and ended up with whole family to get treated.
Clinic has got almost all equipment's and team is quite strong to attend and address any type of dental problems.
We are happy to get treated there and the way the scheduling and planning activities was perfect. No need to wait more than 10 mins.
I recommend the clinic and Doctor for any kind of dental problems, you will get satisfied with the treatment and sure will be happy.
Thanks alot for support as always Dr. Talikoti.
reply_text: Thank u for ur kind wordsüòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had visited the doctor complaining about severe pain of the tooth which was treated couple of years back by a different doctor. The same tooth had problems with the crown implanted and also infected the adjacent tooth. The doctor did the clinical diagnosis, explained me clearly what is the problem all about and the wonderful thing was the line of treatment. Doctor Aarti has so much of patience and also makes the patient feel very confident on the treatment. She is a true professional, quality comes with the cost so I personally felt complete value on the overall treatment. I am done with the treatment now, I am so happy for visiting the doctor. I recommend who ever is reading this post to kindly visit the clinic and will never be disappointed.  The clinic is accredited with ISO which reflects on the quality of the treatment provided. Thank you so much doctor for helping me come out of the problem.
reply_text: Thank u for ur kind wordsüôèüòä

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
The doctor did not provide sufficient information about care after the procedure and what to expect. For e.g.  to not use a straw because it causes loosening of the blood clot *** ********* * *** ** ***** **** ******* I was not aware that the pain and swelling would be this severe as well. 
They took an X ray before the procedure and said there is no other issue than the wisdom tooth, when in reality there was a cavity present in one of my other teeth, now after a few months, it has grown and causes pain, had they looked properly, we could have caught it early.

The care is lacking, there is no due diligence in their methods, the facility and amenities are modern but what is the point if they will just do something to get things done.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

I would recommend prior appointment so that you don't have to wait. I always went with prior appointment on practo and never had to wait for my turn.
